td.content: s:a 40 yr old white M presents with mild sudden onset of chest pain, mild left le pain and swelling and mild shortness of breath for 5 days. he has a history of Deep Venous Thrombosis for past 3 years. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 53.9 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed warfarin - 5 mg daily, and ordered Duplex US of leg.
